
h1. Forum Watch Moderator Actions

# Moderator can manage watches of a specific forum/topic by following guides: 


*Step 1\.* Open the *Watch Tools* form by:

- Go to inside the forum, click the *Forum Tools* and select *Watch Tools* in menu.
- Go to inside the topic, click the *Tools* and select *Watch Tools* in menu.

The *Watch Tools* form will appear:

 !WatchToolsForm.png! 

*Step 2.* Click the !DeleteIcon.png! icon corresponding to the email address you want to delete.

After being deleted, the author of the deleted email will no longer receive email notifications about the forum/topic.
